techmeme.title: Prosus says it has made $2B+ on its Swiggy investment and will retain a 25% stake after Swiggy's IPO, which valued the food and grocery delivery firm at ~$11.3B (Loni Prinsloo/Bloomberg)
Shares of Swiggy opened up ~8% on their trading debut after the company raised $1.34B in its IPO, which became the second largest IPO in India this year (Lim Hui Jie/CNBC)
Perplexity says it will begin experimenting with ads on its platform in the US starting this week; ads will be formatted as "sponsored follow-up questions" (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Vega, which is developing AltOS, a platform to help alternative asset managers further their distributions, raised a $20M Series A led by Apollo and Motive (Irene Garcia Perez/Bloomberg)
Modern Times Group agrees to acquire Tel Aviv-based mobile game maker Plarium for $620M and up to $200M more if Plarium hits financial targets over 2025 to 2028 (Dean Takahashi/VentureBeat)
